defense energy environmental equipment advanced materials medical photonics computer software subassemblies and components test measurement Telecom and Internet and Transportation Authors must designate the appropriate technical area related to their work and submission chosen from this list For more information visit About Techxans Networking Social Host The purpose of Techxans is to promote networking and community among the professionals throughout TexasHouston Austin Dallas and San Antonio by providing entertaining environments for business technology professionals and entrepreneurs to build new friendships alliances and resources Each month we host Happy Hours that further promote networking and social activities Join us by registering for our mailing invite list This will allow us to notify you about our events Click to wwwTechxansorg If you would like to be removed from future event mailings please send an email request to mailto echxansorgsubjectremove If
